sentences.en: Starvation brings biochemical changes in the body.
sentences.cn: 饥饿引起体内的生化变化。

sentences.en: I was suffering from acute sunstroke, starvation and exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 我当时正受着急性中暑、饥饿和疲惫之苦。

sentences.en: Millions will face starvation next year as a result of the drought.
sentences.cn: 由于发生旱灾，明年将有数百万人面临饥饿的威胁。
